definition: It is possible to embed YouTube videos at a Docs page. All you need to know is to copy and pate the YouTube video id into a paragraph with Youtube style.

paragraphs.text: Left click and Edit to enter edit mode and change this text. ENTER to write new paragraphs. ESC to exit edit mode. Style
A style is a definition of color and opacity in case of a polygon body, and color, opacity and line thickness in case of polygon borders.
